channel.title: What we do on QUAY Financials
channel.description: Recent content in What we do on QUAY Financials

item.title: What we do
item.description: This includes direct, algorithmic and electronic trading in listed and over the counter securities, up-to-the-minute market information, instantaneous order execution, and correspondent clearing services. This website principally addresses the Brokerage Division. Quay Financials (Gibraltar) Limited was formerly Van der Moolen (Gibraltar) Limited (which was part of the Van der Moolen Group whose ultimate parent company was Van der Moolen Holdings NV, a company quoted on Euronext (Amsterdam)). The Gibraltar subsidiary was the subject of a Management Buy-Out in June 2008.
